body: Your birth was particularly painful and difficult for your mother, who needed potent divine magic to ensure that you survived (your mother may or may not have). In any event, that magic infused you from an early age, and you now channel divine energy with greater ease than most. Whenever you channel energy, you gain a +1 trait bonus to the save DC of your channeled energy.
name: Sacred Conduit
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Basic Traits/Faith Traits/Sacred Conduit
